Live training is better than online trai: Horar da kai ta fi kyau ta hanyar kan layi. Horon kan layi bai kamata ya maye gurbin bikin ba da rai ba. Abin takaici, saboda iyakancewar damar, sani, samuwa, jadawalin lokaci, da sauran dalilai da yawa, mutane da yawa waɗanda zasu iya kuma yakamata su sami damar halartar taron horo na rayuwa basu da damar shiga. Zúme wani yunƙuri ne na samar da gurɓataccen matakin shigarwa na irin waɗannan mutane.Yana amfani da ka'idodi iri ɗaya kamar yadda yawancin nau'ikan horarwa masu rai suke samu daga wasu. There is no organization that is “runnin: Babu wata kungiya da take "gudanawa" aikin Zúme kuma aikin ba ƙungiya bane. Tunanin wannan aikin ya samo asali ne daga taron Jonathan na jagoranci amma kuma ya zuwa yanzu ya bazu zuwa wancan kungiyar. Tsarin Jonathan wani kamfani ne na mutane da ya himmatu wajen ninka almajirai a duniya.
The first phase focuses on the United St: Kashi na farko yana mai da hankali kan Amurka da Ingilishi. Manufar farko ita ce ta kama hanyar horar da mutane huɗu zuwa sha biyu ga kowane mutane 5,000 na ƙasar. Kowane ɗayan waɗannan rukunin horarwa za a kalubalanci su fara majami'un ƙarni na farko waɗanda su ma ya kamata su haifu. Manufar Amurka shine fara ƙungiyoyi Zubme Turanci sama da 65,000 da majami'u 130,000.
The second phase focuses on coaching the: Kashi na biyu yana mai da hankali kan koyar da wadannan Ikklisiyawan 1 ta hanyar haifuwa tsari, kazalika da isar da aikin a cikin sauran manyan yarukan duniya. Za a fara aikin a ciki wadannan yarukan: Ahmaric, Larabci, Bengali, Bhojpuri, Burmese, Sinanci (Mandarin), Sinanci (Cantonese), Farsi, Faransanci, Jamusanci, Gujarati, Hausa, Hindi, Indonesiyan, Italiyanci, Jafananci, Kannada, Korean, Maithili, Malayalam, Marathi, Oriya, Panjabi (Gabas), Panjabi (Yammaci), Fotigal, Rashanci, Somalanci, Swahili, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Baturke, Urdu,Vietnamese ,Yoruba.
The third phase focuses Phase 1 and Phas: Mataki na uku ya maida hankali ne kan majami'un 1 da Fasaha 2 don shirin dunkulewar duniya tare da hangen nesa zuwa almajirtar da mutane ko'ina, a cikin kowane rukuni. Zubme Project yana wanzu don duniya tare da almajirai masu yawa a cikin tsararrakinmu. Don hanzarta manufa, mun inganta kuma za ta ba da damar zana taswira don ba da damar ƙungiyoyi suyi aiki ta hanyar dabarun ƙungiyar horar da Zúme da kuma majami'u biyu masu sauƙi a tsakanin mutane 50,000 a wajen Amurka.

Wannan yana nuna yadda talakawa, amfani da albarkatu na yau da kullun, zasu iya samun m tasiri ga Mulkin Allah. Zúme yayi nufin ba da ikon ƙarfafa talakawa muminai don isa kowane yanki.
